title: At Kherson direction Russian army shelled Zolota Balka, Kizomys, Antonivka of Kherson region. Russian aviation conducted airs...
content: At Kherson direction Russian army shelled Zolota Balka, Kizomys, Antonivka of Kherson region. Russian aviation conducted airstrike at Mykilske of Kherson region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
